      • validateWinner

        public static java.util.Vector<Players> validateWinner(Players[] gamePlayers)
        The method to determine the winners of the game and to store the winner players in a vector. If the score of two players is same, then their corresponding lantern cards count will be checked to determine the winner.But if the lantern cards are also same, then favor tokens will be counted. If favor tokens are also same then both players will be winner
        Parameters:
        gamePlayers - The array of players of the game.

      • getLanterCardColorRemoval

        public static boolean getLanterCardColorRemoval(Players playing,
                                                java.lang.String deleteColor,
                                                GameInstance gameObj,
                                                int cardCount)
        The method to remove the lantern cards of specified color from the given player.The number of lantern cards will be discarded according to the given cardCount.
        Parameters:
        playing - The current player whose lantern cards will be discarded.
        deleteColor - The color of the lantern card to be discarded
        gameObj - The GameInstance object for updating the lantern cards of the game board.
        cardCount - The number of cards to be discarded
        Returns:
        true if lantern cards of selected color are removed from players lantern count and add to the game lantern count.

      • distributingLakeTilesToRestPlayers

        public static void distributingLakeTilesToRestPlayers(GameInstance gameObj,
                                                      Players playing,
                                                      int y,
                                                      int x)
        The method to distribute the lantern cards to all the players of the game except the current player of the game, whose turn is going on. The players will get the lantern card according to the color of the lake tile card they are facing.
        Parameters:
        gameObj - The GameInstance object for updating the lantern cards of the game board.
        playing - The current player of the game.
        y - The row of the game board.
        x - The column of the game board.

      • distributeLakeTilesPlaying

        public static void distributeLakeTilesPlaying(GameInstance gameObj,
                                              Players playing,
                                              int y,
                                              int x)
        The method to distribute the lantern card and favor tokens to the current player of the game and according to the rules of the game.
        Parameters:
        gameObj - The GameInstance object for updating the lantern cards of the game board.
        playing - The current player of the game.

      • revealLakeTile

        public LakeTiles revealLakeTile(Players playing)
        The method to ask player to select one lake tile from three lake tiles in hand and return the selected lake tile.
        Parameters:
        playing - The player of the game.
        Returns:
        The lake tile selected by the player.

      • getDedicationType3ColorValidationAndRemoval

        public static boolean getDedicationType3ColorValidationAndRemoval(Players playing,
                                                                  GameInstance gameObj)
        The method to update the lantern cards of GameInstance and player according to type 3 dedication (Seven cards of different color).
        Parameters:
        playing - The player who is doing the type 3 dedication.
        gameObj - The GameInstance object to update its elements according to type 3 dedications.
        Returns:
        true if type 3 dedication is successful.

      • getDedicationType2ColorValidationAndRemoval

        public static boolean getDedicationType2ColorValidationAndRemoval(Players playing,
                                                                  java.lang.String yourColor,
                                                                  GameInstance gameObj)
        The method to update the lantern cards of GameInstance and player according to type 2 dedication (Three pairs of unique color).
        Parameters:
        playing - The player who is doing the type 2 dedication.
        colorOne - The color of the lantern card pair to be dedicated.
        gameObj - The GameInstance object to update its elements according to type 2 dedications.
        Returns:
        true if type 2 dedication is successful.

                                                                  java.lang.String yourColor,
                                                                  GameInstance gameObj)
